description: Returns an array of StreamInfo objects. Each object describes a stream. To retrieve only streams that satisfy a specific condition, you can specify a StreamNameCondition.

parameters.name: StreamNameCondition
parameters.description: Optional: Returns only streams that satisfy a specific condition. Currently, you can specify only the prefix of a stream name as a condition. ComparisonOperator (string) --- A comparison operator. Currently, you can specify only the BEGINS_WITH operator, which finds streams whose names start with a given prefix. ComparisonValue (string) --- A value to compare.

nested_params.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_params.description: A comparison operator. Currently, you can specify only the BEGINS_WITH operator, which finds streams whose names start with a given prefix.

nested_items.name: DeviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the device that is associated with the stream.

nested_items.name: StreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Kinesis Video Streams uses to encrypt data on the stream.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp that indicates when the stream was created.

nested_items.name: DataRetentionInHours
nested_items.description: How long the stream retains data, in hours.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, the call returns this element with a token. To get the next batch of streams, use this token in your next request.
